data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perafan, Carlos, Galvis, William, Gutierrez, Miguel, Perez-Miles, Fernando (2016): Kankuamo, a new theraphosid genus from Colombia (Araneae, Mygalomorphae), with a new type of urticating setae and divergent male genitalia. ZooKeys 601: 89-109, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.601.7704, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.601.7704
